features: CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL OIL ABSORBING MOISTURIZER WITH SPF 30: Hydrates skin while leaving a matte finish
4-IN-1 FORMULA FOR SENSITIVE, OILY SKIN: Helps absorb oil, reduce shine, hydrate and provide sun protection
RECOMMENDED BY SKIN CANCER FOUNDATION: Broad spectrum SPF 30 protects against UVA and UVB rays
LIGHTWEIGHT & OIL FREE WITH NO ADDED FRAGRANCE: Absorbs quickly for long lasting hydration without clogging pores
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
body.description: CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with SPF 30 is designed to hydrate, repair and protect sensitive, oily skin. Micropearl technology leaves skin with a matte finish by absorbing oil and helping to reduce shine. Contains Oleosome technology to deliver non-irritating SPF protection. This lightweight, oil free facial moisturizer absorbs quickly and will not clog pores. It is hypoallergenic with no added fragrance to remain gentle on sensitive skin. CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL is recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation for its SPF 30 broad spectrum sun protection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with SPF 30 features Micropearl technology which absorbs surface oil. This helps to reduce shine for sensitive, oily skin, leaving the skin with a matte finish. Formulated with Oleosome technology to deliver broad spectrum SPF 30, protecting against UVA and UVB rays in a way that doesn't irritate sensitive, oily skin. Oleosomes are natural oil droplets extracted from plant seeds and are a perfect carrier for SPF agents. The membrane of these oleosomes gradually releases active ingredients, allowing for long lasting sun protection and hydration without irritation. CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with SPF 30 is designed to be gentle on sensitive, oily skin. The lightweight formula absorbs quickly and won't clog pores. It is fragrance free and hypoallergenic, so won't irritate sensitive skin.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL advanced therapeutic skin care is designed with dermatologists to deliver advanced solutions for specific sensitive skin conditions CETAPHIL skincare products are developed with and clinically tested by dermatologists. *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Absorbing Moisturizer has been awarded the Seal of Recommendation from The Skin Cancer Foundation as effective at preventing skin damage.

Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective cleanser morning and night Keep skin clean from the dirt and bacteria that can clog your pores by cleansing morning and night. CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Removing Foam Wash washes gently yet deeply cleanses the skin, removing pore-clogging oil, impurities and makeup. Leaves the skin feeling clean and soothed without over drying. Immediately follow with a moisturizer to lock in hydration Follow your morning cleanse with an SPF moisturizer such as CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Oil Absorbing Moisturizer with SPF 30. Deliver nourishing hydration that locks in vital moisture, protects skin from harmful UVA and UVB rays and leaves skin with a matte finish. This oil free moisturizer is non-comedogenic, so it will hydrate without clogging pores or irritating your skin Include clay masks in your weekly skin care routine to deep clean pores Applying a clay mask, such as CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL Purifying Clay Mask, provides additional deep cleansing to your oily skin care routine, helping you reduce excess oil and unclog pores. Use a clay mask up to 3 times per week to help keep your sensitive, oily skin under control. Complete your sensitive, oily skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your sensitive, oily prone skin will help to leave your skin feeling soothed and nourished. All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Learn More Skincare benefit Clinically proven to effectively remove excess oil, without stripping or drying skin Broad spectrum SPF protection that absorbs oil while moisturizing skin Deeply cleans pores and reduces excess oil so that skin is left feeling ultra-clean Convenient cloths that effortlessly remove waterproof makeup and gently cleanses skin Lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that provides immediate and intense hydration Unique gel-cream quickly absorbs to hydrate, brighten and smooth under eye area Skin type Sensitive skin/ Oily skin Sensitive skin/ Oily skin Sensitive skin/ Oily skin Sensitive skin/ All skin types Sensitive skin/ Combination skin Sensitive skin/ All skin types Key ingredients Innovative Zinc technology Micropearl technology and Olesome technology Bentonite clay, Amazonian kaolin clay and apple fruit extract Aloe vera, Chamomile and Green tea Hyaluronic Acid Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Chamomile extract, Green tea extract and Licorice root extract Hypoallergenic ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Won't clog pores (Non-comedogenic) ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Fragrance-free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars i like it !
reviews.reviewText: i love this moisturizer it has minimized my oil presence A LOT !! But OMG do not, i repeat DO NOT put this near your eyes. my eyes been burning all damn day. i even tried to wipe around my eyes and it still burns. other than that, great product !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Its moisturizing and great for daily use. The packaging is nice and easy to use. One pump and you're all set. It's light weight and gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best moisturizers I've used
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, oil absorbing and gets the job done!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Shiny, but did NOT cause breakouts
reviews.reviewText: I have very oily skin, not just on the T-zone, basically all over my face. I suffer from patchy/red complexion on my cheeks and breakouts are mainly on my chin and around the mouth.While searching for a sunblock, I wanted something that wouldn't be greasy. Unfortunately, this is very greasy on me. Like, butter on a pan kind of greasy. It does moisturize, and it does apply easily and I can layer it without any effects.I would suggest putting on a tinted BB cream, or just a bit of foundation and lightly powder. That's what I do and my natural oils will appear anyway after several hours, but the shine is not nearly as bad as it is when first applying. It did not cause me any breakouts. It WILL burn your eyes as other reviews mentioned. I figured "well I'll just avoid my eye area when applying it" but it has vapors or something that still sting the eyes. Also during the day if you have to itch your eyes, it will burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superior oil control
reviews.reviewText: I’ve struggled with extremely oily skin my entire life. I’ve been trying out various products to address this but nothing has really made a dent in keeping my face shine free during the day. This product is incredible. Applied this morning at 6am and my face has remained fresh and dramatically oil free as of 1pm writing this. Fellow oily girls out there, give this a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for oily skin!
reviews.reviewText: I have used countless forms of moisturizers, and I’ve always had a hard time finding one that didn’t leave my skin looking all shiny and oily. This is the first one that leaves my skin moisturized, and it doesn’t leave it all oily in the end. It also has sunscreen which is always essential to daily facial skincare! If you have oily skin, or your skin is normal to oily, I would give this a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is an unpleasant cream; if it gets on the mucous membranes of the eyes, it stings a lot. skin after time is very dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Barely there and effective
reviews.reviewText: This is so light, and such a mild scent, that I barely notice it when I’m wearing it. Recently I was getting flaky skin in my eyebrows and ears. I live at high altitude in a very sunny place, and realized that I really need to incorporate a daily sun screen, but my skin is sensitive and combination and I wanted a product that wouldn’t feel heavy. Using this daily, all the flakiness has disappeared.

La mejor crema hidratante para piel grasa que he comprado. Me ha ayudado bastante para que mi cutis no se vea grasoso y con brillo e hidrata muy bien. Aquí la he comprado en ofertas ya que baja mucho el precio y me llega en perfecto estado. La recomiendo mucho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Worth the money... But stings my eyes
reviews.reviewText: Okay.. So I've been trying to find a good moisturiser with Spf that won't turn me purple/ashy and I'm glad I decided to buy this. I have dark acne prone skin that turns oily as soon as you put anything on it. This is the best SPF I've come across so far. And it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy although there is a bit of a sheen on the skin, I wouldn't class it as oily. I haven't had any major breakouts since using it however the one thing I don't like is that at the end of the day it really makes my eyes stink like crazy! So I make sure I wash it off as soon as I come home from work...Although it's expensive and sometimes painful I'd still buy it again as long as I don't end up looking like Casper the ghost!
Excited to try and know what will the result on my skin
Es una excelente crema hidratante, no se siente grasosa, me la recomendó mi dermatologa. Llegó en muy buen estado

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Best in the market for oily skin
reviews.reviewText: I have oily skin and it abosros everything, keeps my skin moisturised again dry spots and protect from sunlight/rays. Best product, worth the money
